line_1: Croud silent round thee, and look sad in crape;
line_2: What tho' no solemn mutes, of ghastly shape,

line_1: An' Robin's bonnet wave wi' crape
line_2: Wae worth that man wha first did shape,

line_1: An' Robin's bonnet wave wi' crape
line_2: That vile, wanchancie thing — a raep!

line_1: An' Robin's bonnet wave wi' crape
line_2: It maks guid fellows girn an' gape,

line_1: This Prostitute, this Fiend in Crape,
line_2: Dares now accuse me for a Rape,
